div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxiijo die
mensis octobris Anno quo supra

The quhilk day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane
assise Thomas mar talisman that Jonhne' of fochile is quyt of the vij li' g' clamit
and follouit be Alexander prat And' the saide alexander in amerciament of the court for the wran
guis' borghe' strekyne apone the saide Jonhne and he quyt of his clame

the samyn day Jonhne colisone Solemptlie protestit quhat euire happin be done
anent the borghe' strekit vpone him Thome of mar' Dauid menyeis and Androw culan
be george eduardsone forspekar for gilbert menyeis for the wranguis' withthaldin
fra the saide gilbert of xiij li' iiij s' for certan Salt Ilkan man for his avne part
Suld' turne him nor his saide fallouis to nay preiudice na he mycht haue
and his fallouis Remede of law ande becaus' the saide Dauid grantit his part
of the saide Siluer it suld' turne thame to nay preiudice

the samyne day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais as day
of peremptour to Jonhne colisone thome of mar and Androu culan to ansuer to
the borghe strekit vpone thame be george eduardsone forspekar for gilbert menyeis
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xiij li' and iiij s' for certan Salt Ilkan for
thar awne parte
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvio die mensis octobris Anno quo supra

the samyne day Jonhne of Kintor oblist him be the fatht of his body to pay
xij s' to Alexander angusone or this next sonday And' atour the saide Jonhne grantit
him avand' xxxij d' ane doubile blak bonat to the saide Alexander quhilk the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

the samyn day In presens of the aldirman balyeis ande the haile courte comperit
Williame prat brothir germane to Dauid prat And' grantit him wele content
ande fullely pait of ale barnisparte of gudis and of ale vthir thingis pertening
to him be deces' of vmquhile Robert prat his fadir or may pertene And'
quiet'clamit and dischargit the saide Dauid and al vthiris quhome it efferis now
ande foreuire vpone the quhilkis the saide Dauid tuk Instrument in the handis of sere
Jonhne Stirueline Notar befor sere Jonhne ruthirfurd aldirman Alexander menyeis
James leslie alexander rede thomas prat and Alexander angusone

The saide day James of Kintor oblist him be the fatht of his bodie In
presens of the aldirman ane ballieis sittande in Jugement to bringe
ane sufficient acquitance fra Thomas hobsone Inglisman of foure barrellis
of Salmonde aucht to him / betuix this and the law day eftir yule nexte
to cum And' falyeing' tharof he sal pay tene pundis of Siluer the saide day
to the procuratouris of the saide thomas Ande falyeing tharof the Siluer be vnpait the
saide day the saide James sal fynd' Souerte to the procuratouris of the forsaide
thomas to pay thame four barrellis of Salmonde at this next fischinge

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
mar' talisman that Jonhne Watsone sal content and pay to Williame
Wormet xiij flemys noblis and ane half for certane skinnis And' gif the
said William preuys vxx skinnis derrar sauld' than viij noblis the hundretht
he sal pay him

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas mar'
talisman that William nicholsone sal pay to george of torntone' xl s'
Dauid menyeis eldar xl s' James of Kintor xl s' for the fraucht
of his boyt to bernis And' xxvij s' amang thame thre equaly
for costis ande expensis and Dauid hovyson'

Eodem die georgius torntone fecit constitut creauit et nominauit Alexandrum
menyeis et Robertum blinsel coniunctim et diuisim ad procuratores suos legittimos
ad petendum et recepiendum a Dauid menyeis seniore Jacobo Kintor et Willelmo
nicholson' Septem li' et vij s' et sibi debitos et Inde acquitand' prosequend'
defendend' et cetera promittensque de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

the samyn day gilbert moresone grantit ane obligacion maid be him to Jhon'
Narne of xxiij inglis' grotis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die octoberis
Anno quo supra

The quhilk day the balyeis ordanit and assignit
to Jonhne of lammyntone and Androu lammyntone to entir Williame
quhit yongar befor thame within the tolbutht of abirdene one monun
day cum aucht dais to ansuer to Androw culane for xlviij stanis of
woll grantit avand' be the saide William to the saide Androw Ande
falyeing' thai entir him nocht the saide day thai ordanit the saidis
Jonhne ande Androw to ansuer to the saide Androw culan for the saide wole as
law wile
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos secundo die nouembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk day balyeis gert call Androw Wentone lauchfullie to entir Thome
Wodman as he that come borghe' to entir him befor thaim the saide day for the entirin
of cowe Jonhnesone at the Instance of Androw murray for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xxiij peter of woll and xvj s' of Siluer And' chargit the officiar
philp of Dunbrek to tak ane distres' of the said Androu Wentone and warne
him to entir the saide thomez befor thaim one friday next to cum
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio quarto die nouembris Anno quo supra

the samyne day Symone of gardin was conuikit be ane suorne assis' Dauid
mathesone talisman for the wranguis' strubulance of Robert flescher and his wyf
vndir cilence of the nicht tile amend' as law will and to forber' in tyme
to cum

the said day Androu peterkin was conuikit for the forstalling' of the towne be his
avne tong grant And' componit with the aldirman to this day for al forstallin
bigan

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos Sexto
die Nouembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk day James leys
assignit to Williame of leys his brothir fifty s' that alexander Rede is avand'
him with pouer to resaue the saide money fra the saide alexander and to gif quitance
tharof

Eodem die Willelmus portar deuenit plegius legalis quod alexander
tailyour et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro thoma Narne aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Andreas Wentone deuenit plegius legalis quod Idem thomas et
pars sua erunt Indempnes pro dicto alexandro aliter quam per viam Juris

the samyn day Androu Wentone become souerte to the ballieis be his hand
tile entir cowe Jonhnsone befor thame in the tolbutht within xxti dais heftir hereftir
And falyeing he entir him nocht he become dettour' to Androu murray
eldar for xxxiij peter of woll and xvi s' of Siluer to be pait at the next
woll tyme And' thome Wodman oblist him be his hand' to freithe
and keipe the saide Androu Wentoune skathles tharanent

Eodem die thomas Wodman fecit constituit et creauit Andream Wentone suum
legittimum procuratorem et actorem ad petendum et recipiendum omnia bona sibi debit' ac in omnibus
aliis actionibus ipsum concernen' et Inde acquitand' prosequend' et defendend'
promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvio die mensis
Nouembris Anno quosupra

the quhilk day the aldirman and part of the
consal ordanit Jhone menyeis the balye to keipe the merkat one Wed
nisday next hereftir Williame blinsele to keipe the mercat one settirday
thareftir And' Androw culane the next mercat day And' say furtht continualy
keipe the merkat Ilkane his day about

The samyn day In presens of the aldirman ande balyeis it was appontit
and aggreit betuix Robert blinsele Williame of gareache and the layf of the
avnaris of the hulk one that ane part And' the merchandis of the samyn
present for the tyme that the gudis being in the saide schipe salbe losit
and or the gudis pas' fra the key excepe weyt gudis thai sal do
to the avnaris that thai aw of resone for thar fraucht

The samyn day Richerd hile eldar grantit him byndyne with Jonhne
Wormet to Androu Wentone for tene markis of this last martimes
terme and j kirtill of rede meneys as in the obligacion maid tharapon'
mair' fullely is contenit the quhilk the aldirman ande ballieis char
git the said Richerd to pay within terme of law

the saide day Androu Wentone grantit him avand' to Jonhne Robert
sone tene markis quhilkis the aldirman ande balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes robertsone in taruas' fecit constituit et ordinauit
thomam prat suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum
decim marcas ab andrea Wentone et Inde acquitand' prosequend'
et defendend' promittendibus de Rato et grato et cetera

the samyn day thir personis vndir writin that is to say marion' Dys'
Jonet parfyt marione broys marione ray Jonet smitht Jonet sanclar'
Anny neile ellene quhit marione balcromy cristiane Wellame bessy
lownane Anny skynnar Marione fethirnere mege tailyour and the wyf
of Jonhne soutar ar conuikit be ane assis' for the breking' of common'
statutis othir spilling of the merkat or bakin' of the saile cakis And the
aldirman and consal has statut' and ordanit that the saide personis sal
nocht cum in the mercat nor yet bak saile cakis for this yer vndir
the payne of banysing' of the towne

The samyne day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander rede
talisman that betuix this ande our lady eftir Sanct Nicholes' day Richerd
litstar sal bring sere Symond' of Kingorne befor the aldirman and balyeis
ande he sal depone the gret aithe that he was present quhene the saide Rich
erde pait fourty s' to Androw branche And gif he may nocht cum he sale
bring he sal sufficient document for the saide sere Symond' that he was
present quhen the saide xl s' was pait And that being' done thai fynd'
the said Androu pait of xx li' and iiij s' And falyeing' tharof thai fand'
him pait bot of xvij li' and iiij s' of xxij li' and x s' aucht to the saide
androu be his avne graunt for thre pipis of wade

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin' the xviij day of Nouember the yere
forsaide the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis tile Androw branche tile
ane borghe' strekit apone him be William of gareache for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of fifty s' with the mair' of fraucht to Compt and rekning

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxiiij die Nouembris
anno quo supra

the quhilk day philp Dunbrek officiar' at commavnd' of the
balyeis chargit be his wand' Jonhne Wormet to remane within the tolbutht
quhile he pait v li' x s' and v d' of his wattir maile for ane demi nethis
fischingis of the mydchingile of the yer' quhilkis was oft tymes askit
at him and one gottyne And' the said Jhone passit avay out of the tolbutht
eftir the said charge and pait nocht the said maile befor thir witnes Alexander
chamer of murchil Jonhne of Culan Androw Wyntone William gareache Alexander
scrogis sere mathou nicholson' and vthir diuers'

the samyn day sere mathou nicholson in the name of Wylyeame Nicholsone
his brothir askit at Williame of gareache certane skinnis pertening to the
said Williame be deliuerit to him and losit out of the hulk offering him
redy to fynd' Souerte to do for the fraucht of the saide skinnis that law will
And' protestit quhat skath that the said skinnis takis suld' be recompensit
as law will

The thrid day of December the yer forsaide sere Symond Kingorne suorne befor
the officialis of abirdene thareftir comperit befor the balyeis and declarit be his aithe he was
present and herd compt and rekning betuix Androw branche and Richerd litstar bot he saw neuire
the said Richerd pay nor gif him d' of gold nor Siluer'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxvij die mensis
Nouembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day Dauid mar' producit in Juge
ment ane charter ande possessione of half ane lande liand' in the
gallougate annaleit to him be aly loremar' and askit the arrest made
be the officiar' to be lousit And' thareftir the aldirman and balyeis chargit
phip Dunbrek officiar to lous' the saide arrest to the said Dauid And'
the saide Dauid come souerte be his lande and gudis to be responsale tile
ony man havand' mair' richt thane he hes to the saide lande for the
malis of the samyn

the samyn day it was sufficientlie preuyt befor the aldirman ande
balyeis that Robert of buchane come dettour to sere mathow nichol
sone for xx s' for the maile of the hous' that Robe bovar' duellis
in and the loft abewne quhilk was set to Androw clerk his mache
and Wille buchane oblist him be his hande to pay to sere William
mvresone x s' of this last martimes terme in the Name of the saide sere mathow
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio te quarto die Decembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk day Jonhne colisone callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer' tile ane
borghe strekit apone him be William blinsel in the handis of philpe of
Dunbrek officiar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane hary nobile
tharfor the balyeis chargit the said officiar to tak ane stres' of the saide
Jonhnis and lat it to borghe gif it be askit and warne the said Jhon'
to comper one mononday that next cumis to ansuer to the said borghe' as
law will

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio Septimo die mensis
Decembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk day the aldirman and ballieis grantit
that Androw murray eldar salbe dischargit of the maile of fischingis of ane Sex part
of the crowis quhilk he has in tak of Jonhne of Kintor of the martimes
terme bigan and of the Witsonday terme to cum the said Androu payand thre
li' and iiij d' to the aldirman and balyeis

Eodem die Johannes rede in amerciamento Curie per assisam pro pertur
bio patricij oge et vxoris sue sub cilencio noctis precogitata
malicia Et dictus patricius quitus et sponsa sua de perturbio dicti
patricij

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure domini Johannes Ruthirfurd militis
Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo nono

Johannes Kethe recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsavit filiam
burgensis prestito solito Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Johannes ranison sutor recipitur in liberum burgensem Jure paternitatis prestito solito Juramento et solut'
quinque s'

Johannes laynge ad instanciam alexandri gordone militis recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito commoran' in obyne

Johannes selby recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam domini de
meldrum prestito solito Juramento
Thomas valcar recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsavit filiam burgensis prestito solito Juramento

Alexander pyot recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paternitatis solut' quinque s' et
prestito solito Juramento

Alexander myrtone ad instanciam domini nostri Episcopi recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento

Alexander brovne in forglene recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam alexandri
Iruyne de lummey prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes thomsone tinctor recipere in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia burgensis fuit de Dunde
ad instanciam quorundam consilij Solut' ij marcis ac prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus meldrum de fywe recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa
Walterus Robertsone pistor recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento

Dauid Thomas gledstane recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' ij marcis
et prestito Solito Juramento

Gilbertus fechat tintor ad Instanciam prepositi recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes loremar' racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et solut'
quinque s' in alba bursa

Walterus atkin racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Andreas litstar racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Johannes murray Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Andreas Scot Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

xxviij die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
nonogesimo octuagesimo nono tempore prepositure domini Johannis ruthirfurde
in die apostolorum Symonis et Jude apostolorum philippus Dunbrek
Intrauit in officium theoloneij Ad Soluendum inde pensionis prioribus
et conuentibus predicatorum et carmelitarum fratrum debit' et consuet' ut predecessoris
sui persoluerunt Item deliberati sibi fuerunt octo modei tonnei' mensur'
fideliter mensurat' pro quibus respondit

the samyne day the balye ordanit philp Dunbrek officiar' to warne
Jonhne colisone to ansuer perempturlie one Wednisday tile the borghe' strekit
apone him be Williame blinsele for the wranguis' halding' of ane hary
nobile

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos ixo die Decembris Anno
quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus howat et alicia loremar constituerunt et ordina
runt Arthurum forbes de Reres' suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum recipiendumque
firmas dimidietatis vnius terre Jacentis in vico furcarum de terminis elapsis et cum eisdem
intromittend' in futurum et de receptis acquitand' Necnon ad prosequendum Jus
suum penes dictam dimidietatem terre agend' et defendend' promittendibus de
Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die alexander logy deuenit plegius legalis quod patricius oge Alanus litstar
et Robertus tailyour erunt Indempnes pro Johanne rede pardo et parte sua aliter
quam per viam iuris et Johannes thomsone gener thome litstar deuenit plegius
legalis pro Roberto tailyour / Andreas Watson' pro alano litstar et dictus Robertus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio decimo die Decembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne of culan
talisman that Williame quhit sal pay to Dauid simson aucht stane and demi
of woll within terme of law And' the said Williame fand' Androw lammynton'
dettour be his hand' to pay to Dauid simson' lix s' vj d' for the said
woll be the law day eftir yule And' to pay viii d' to the balyeis

In the balye courte of abirdene haldin the xi day of December the
yer forsaide Androu chamer grantit in his fadir name avand' xij s' to
Dauid Duffous' and Jonhne quhithed grantit him avand' xix s' and vj d'
to the saide Dauid the quhilkis the ballieis chargit thame to pay
within terme of law

the samyne day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule to mastir
Androu cadiow to preif that the barrell of Salmond' that Dauid
mathesone clamyt bocht fra Jonhne Duncansone was Wat of ogiluys

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene et cetera the xij day of December the
yer forsaide

The quhilk day the debat betuix Jhone Wormet one that ane part
and Williame blinsel one that vthir part anent the maile of half ane
nethis fischingis of the mydchingile was put tile ane declara
cione of the aldirman and consale quhilkis riplie avisit fand' and
deliuerit that the said William suld pay the said maile and fre the
saide Jonhne tharof And' thai fand' the sayde Jonhne nay dissobear'
and the ak maid tharvpone obefor to be of nane avale

the samyne day Robert fleschar and Jonhne of cowys was fundyne
quyt be ane suorne assise Williame abirdour talisman of the
wranguis' resat and harbreing' of thame that tak avay tua hors'
fra mastir Jonhne spens tua fra mastir Androw cadiow and tua fra thomas
prat out of the said burghe vndir Cilence of the nicht

the saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman and consale
that the possessione of half ane lande liand' in the gallougate
gevin to aly loremar and Will hovat hir spous' is of waile eftir
the tenor' of Dauid marris resignacion maide tharvpone obefore

The samyn day William blinsel was chargit be the balye
is to remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait xvj lib'
xj s' and iij d' aucht be him of wattir maile

Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiiij die Decembris
Anno quo supra

the quhilk day it was deliuerit be ane assis' tho
mas fyf talisman that Androw branche sal pay to William
gareache eldar l s' for fraucht within terme of law

The samyne day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule next to cum
to Dauid mar to preif that Williame howat is avand' to him iij li' iiij s'
of Siluer ande j chaldir of beire And arthour forbes of reres' drew his
landis ande gudis within the saide burghe' be his hand' uphaldin to the balyeis to be
responsale for samekile' of the saide money ande bere as happinnis the saide Da
uid tile optene vpone the saide Williame

the samyn day the aldirman ande balyeis assignit Jonhne colisonis half nethis
maile of the raik of this martimes terme lest bigane ande of the Witsonday
terme to cum to Jonhne gray mastir masone in part of pament of his fee
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvij die Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day the ballieis assignit tuysday that next cumis to Dauid sone
and procuratour to Syme robertsone to bring ane certificacion fra the Curat of
taruas of the said Symondis deposicion gif the last compt maide betuix Richerd
hill and the saide Symond' was clair' but ony debate
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviii die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day In presens of the aldirman and balyeis Androw branche grantit to
pay to Williame of gareache eldar lti s' within terme of law quhilk was opte
nit apon him obefor for fraucht

the said day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' mastir Androw cadiow
talisman that Williame of gareache is quyt of ane borghe strekit vpon him
be Androu branche for the refundin' of the skath of xxxij stane of woll wett
in ane schipe callit Nicholes' of abirdene becaus' it was fundin the said William
was nay mastir of the said schip that tyme for alexander makeson was mastir
outwartis of the samyn schip to quhome the saide Androw has his clame and action
anent his skatht of the saide woll

the said day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that Williame gareache eldar sal pay
j barrell of vnyonnis to Androw branche
